mcq.statement: Choose the grammatically correct sentence from the following: Jill took Justin and I to the shop., Jenny and me joined the chess club., He is stronger than any man living., He is stronger than any other man living.

options.a: Jill took Justin and I to the shop.
options.b: Jenny and me joined the chess club.
options.c: He is stronger than any man living.
options.d: He is stronger than any other man living.
